Body:
"""Test the tokenizer handles bracketed Fig. abbreviation correctly."""
text = (
    'The model is in good agreement with the intensity of the peaks observed in the XRD patterns (Fig. 1).'
    )
sents = [
    'The model is in good agreement with the intensity of the peaks observed in the XRD patterns (Fig. 1).'
    ]
self.assertEqual(sents, self.ps.tokenize(text))
